titles.title: worthy o worthy are you lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy, Oh worthy are You Lord,
Worthy to be thanked and praised
And worshiped and adored. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Singing Hallelujah, Lamb upon the throne,
We worship and adore You,
As You make Your glory known.
Singing Hallelujah, glory to the King.
You're more than a conqueror;
You're Lord of everything.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Digno, digno eres Señor
Digno de alabanza, acción de gracias
Y honor.
